snippet: Chris Paul had 23 points and 12 assists for Los Angeles, which has beaten the Nets in five consecutive games at Staples Center.
lead_paragraph: Chris Paul had 23 points and 12 assists for Los Angeles, which has beaten the Nets in five consecutive games at Staples Center.

headline.main: Clippers Keep Nets From Winning a Third Straight
headline.print_headline: Clippers Keep Nets From Winning a Third Straight
